name: ROCK TYRE WEBSITE
description: Any user can login and add product to their bag.Admin and Normal user has two different route to access the site. User can add review and that shows on home page

name: FRIDGE BD WEBSITE
description: Fridge stock and management system.Admin can visit and update the stock.New added products show on the home page automatically.Google & email,pass Sign in

name: THE TOUR BEES SITE
description: User can Sign up with google and email password. User can not go to checkout unless login. Automatic toggle for logged in user to see logout on top. Email verification.
technology: ReactJS, MongoDB, Firebase, ExpressJS, NodeJS, Tailwind, EmailJS
